segments.text: I went to the tutoring service centre on campus today . And I got a job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They got me a part-time tutoring job , teaching an Australian businessman Chinese .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's wonderful . I want to get a part-time job too . Tell me what I should do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very simple actually . You can go to the service centre and have your name and job interest resisted . They will give you a call if any job comes up .
segments.speaker: S1
